!*> Setup
!include Setup

For the test, it is necessary to create a couple of accounts.
|process member                                                                                                                                         |
|account name|credential|credential type|action|member id|public key|new account name|new credential|member role|member id?|return code?|return message?|
|admin       |admin     |PASSPHRASE     |CREATE|null     |null      |user1           |password1     |standard   |=~/\S{36}/|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|admin       |admin     |PASSPHRASE     |CREATE|null     |null      |user2           |password2     |standard   |=~/\S{36}/|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|user1       |password1 |null           |LOGIN |null     |null      |null            |session1      |null       |null      |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|user2       |password2 |null           |LOGIN |null     |null      |null            |session2      |null       |null      |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |

2 Different Circles of Trust with Trustees is also needed
|Process Circle                                                        |
|credential|action|circle name|circle id?|return code?|return message ?|
|session1  |create|circle1    |=~/\S{36}/|${SUCCESS}  |Ok              |
|session2  |CREATE|circle2    |=~/\S{36}/|${SUCCESS}  |Ok              |

|process trustee                                                                 |
|credential|action|circle id |member id|trust level|return code?|return message ?|
|session1  |ADD   |circle1_id|user2_id |WRITE      |${SUCCESS}  |Ok              |
|session2  |ADD   |circle2_id|user1_id |READ       |${SUCCESS}  |Ok              |

*!

!2 '''!-CWS-! Process Data Request'''
The !-CWS-! Process Data Type can be made by

|process data                                                                                                                                         |
|credential|action|circle id |data id |data name|type name|data              |return code?        |return message?                                    |
|session1  |ADD   |circle1_id|null    |data1    |folder   |null              |${SUCCESS}          |Ok                                                 |
|session1  |ADD   |circle1_id|null    |data2    |data     |First Data Object |${SUCCESS}          |Ok                                                 |
|session2  |ADD   |circle2_id|null    |data3    |Object42 |Second Data Object|${INTEGRITY_WARNING}|Cannot find a matching !-DataType-! for the Object.|
|session2  |DELETE|null      |data1_id|null     |null     |null              |${SUCCESS}          |Ok                                                 |

|fetch data                                                 |
|credential|data id |data name?|return code?|return message?|
|session1  |data2_id|data2     |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
